lx4p

Interface LXUPnPDelegate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LXHueInterface

    public interface LXUPnPDelegate
    LXUPnPDelegate is an interface for implementing Universal Plug and Play discovery. Classes implementing LXUPnPDelegate can receive a foundURLBase() call when the LXPUnPDiscoverer locates a device's description file.
    Version:
    001
    Author:
    Claude Heintz
    See Also:
    LXUPnPDiscoverer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void foundURLBase(java.lang.String u)
      Called when the search returns the URLBase from the XML Device description located with SSDP
      void setLXUPnPDiscoverer(LXUPnPDiscoverer d)
      Called when the delegate of LXUPnPDiscoverer is set to pass back a reference.

    • Method Detail

      • setLXUPnPDiscoverer

        void setLXUPnPDiscoverer(LXUPnPDiscoverer d)
        Called when the delegate of LXUPnPDiscoverer is set to pass back a reference. Delegates should keep this reference in order to call close() which stops search and closes socket properly
        Parameters:
        d - the LXUPnPDiscoverer associated with the delegate

      • foundURLBase

        void foundURLBase(java.lang.String u)
        Called when the search returns the URLBase from the XML Device description located with SSDP
        Parameters:
        u - the URL string of the base URL for the located device
